r.d: It takes an array of data as input and page it according to various parameters. It also builds links within a specified range, and allows complete customization of the output (it even works with mod_rewrite). Two modes available: "Jumping" and "Sliding" window style.
r.n: - Fixed handling of errors raised in common base class - Added an 'extraVars' option to add vars to the querystring - Added <link> tags building (patch by Joerg Bruckmann) - Fixed Bug #589 (common.php raise a notice if the querystring has no '=' character) - Use '&amp;' instead of '&' in urls for better XHTML conformance
